name: SMART Table Activity Pack File
summary: Learn about .TABLECONTENT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The TABLECONTENT activity pack can hold up to eight applications. Some of the applications are customizable. You can download activity packs for your SMART Table learning center through the "Online Activity Packs" tab in the SMART Table Toolkit.

description: Activity pack file created and used by SMART Table Toolkit, an application used to customize activities for the SMART Table collaborative learning center; stores one or more applications and activities; may include saved customizations to activities.
